website_summaries.verdict: Though not the most versatile choice, it's a nice sofa with some attractive features.
pros: Soft microfiber material is easy to wipe clean
Durable construction includes attached back cushions
cons: Some owners say the material has a strange smell
The color is a bit darker in person

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy- Amazon customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: Wow ! Where do I start?! First- amazons customer service during delivery of this product was Amazing! I did. Order from Amazon and it was shipped by Amazon as well. The delivery guys brought it inside which save me and my husband the hassle. It Is much bigger than I imagined in a great way. Now the sectional is just fantastic - it grey with light grey stitching - I absolutely adore it and it is very comfortable. It matches well with my neutral decor ! For the price it is well worth it. If you decide to buy I highly recommend through Amazon- I was able to schedule shipping and it arrived on time . Very pleased 'nn
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Cheap/will not last 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: We bought our couch less than 8 months ago and the frame broke. We do not have kids, my fiancé and I are of normal stature and weight and over the weekend she sat down and heard a crunch. I contacted the seller and it does not seem that it will be an easy process to talk to someone about the quality of their product... Shame on me for making such a large purchase on amazon. Please do not make the same mistake. This couch looks nice but it will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not microfiber or even close to that feeling, it's much rougher than I anticipated. Arrived a nearly a month and a half after I ordered it. There was an extra charge if I wanted the shipping company to bring the boxes past the front door. Sectional pieces do not fit together tightly, there are gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Love how nice and big this couch is plus the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how nice and big this couch is plus the ability to make 5 payments instead of paying in full right away was great. I did not really like the cloth material: it feels like canvas. And it is a bit cheaply made (it squeaks and creeks already and we have had it 2 months), but I guess that is to be expected with the price we paid. I like it otherwise. It fits my husband and I plus my mother-in-law, father-in-law, our 5 & 6 year old and our 1 year old. very nice overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great but Expected More
customer_reviews.text: I love how this couch looks and it is comfortable. However, about an inch of stitching in one of the cushions is already loose and it isn't even 6 months old yet. Also, the corner cushion is already losing its fluffiness. A lot of the stuffing has settled down to the bottom cushion. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite place to do nothing
customer_reviews.text: Great sofa! The color and fabric are perfect. Best part is this gives enough room for the family and dogs to hang out together. It is nice that the sides are cushioned, too. I was somewhat intimidated because it arrived in two GIGANTIC boxes. However, all you really have to do is screw on the legs. It is not even terribly heavy. I like it:)
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Waldrip

customer_reviews.title: Could find better for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The part between the chaise and the long section of the couch has a small gap at the top. Other than that it's sturdy. Have to drill your own holes for the legs was a pain! Also make sure you have at least two people available to set the couch up.
customer_reviews.author: LorrindaS83

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sectional and Amazon's customer care was outstanding!!! I cannot say enough positive things about the assistance and follow-up with them. My experiences with Amazon customer care (past and present) keep me coming back and I recommend Amazon to all my friends!! The sectional is soooo comfortable, you sink into it. It is large enough for my 17 year old, almost 6' tall son to lie on it comfortably. I wish they made a matching ottoman for it; however I bought a leather ottoman with storage and it compliments the sectional well though.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later and still happy! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sofa two years ago and I’m extremely happy with it! I have a small apartment and it fits well in the space. The couch is quite comfortable and looks really nice. Many of my friends have complimented me on its comfort and style. Now that I’ve had it two years I hear it creaking here and there so I worry it’s breaking down a bit but honestly it’s still fine so who knows. I am extremely satisfied with the couch for the price! I’d recommend it to anyone who’s looking for something reasonably priced, comfortable and that looks nice. Two years later and still happy!
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: Love it & Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about ordering furniture online but I'm really happy i did. I love this sectional and delivery was easy/no hassle. We did have to dispose of our old sofa on our own but the savings from ordering this on Amazon was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleW.

customer_reviews.title: Darker than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great couch! Really wonderful for our space. Giving it four stars because it is significantly darker in person than in the photos. Either way it's a wonderful purchase and will be greatly loved and used in our home!!
customer_reviews.author: E B Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Amazing Price
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a couch on Amazon and I don't regret it. Very comfortable and amazing price. The couch is big enough to have someone taking a nap on the chaise and someone else on the long side. Delivery was quick and they set up the whole thing very nicely. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marc-Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Love this couch
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch! For the price, you can't beat it. Color is great. Size perfect. Stitching on the cushions looks very nice. I love that the back cushions are connected (our other sectional cushions are not connected so we are always having to re-position them). The packaging was a pain in the neck and the legs were not easy to screw in, but again, for $900+, it's hard to find something this nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Total love the sectional...just as described. .great quality. ..fast delivery. ..love the chocolate color!. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN FISHER

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Was bigger and better than I expected! Very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, cheap manufacturing :(
customer_reviews.text: Thought that furniture listed at $1,780 (bought for $950) would be constructed half decently, but after having it home for a few days I can see how you truly do get what you pay for. The fabric isn't stretched around the frame correctly and the arm rests feel like they're made of Popsicle sticks. If it weren't such a hassle to return this I'd just get something from Ikea. Also, leg installation says you just need a screwdriver to install but there aren't pre-drilled holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sectional
customer_reviews.text: The look and comfort of this sectional were great. I have had it for about 3 years now and it has broken down quite a bit. It’s easy to clean and still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa street

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you only want half of the couch.
customer_reviews.text: Only received half a couch twice. Dare I try a third time?
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Bachus

customer_reviews.title: Great couch
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy... no complaints for the price... i got it the next day...
customer_reviews.author: arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice couch for the price. Really comfortable. Great color and fabric. Only real complaint is that the holes in the base where you attach the feet were not pre-drilled like the instructions indicated. Luckily we had a drill so it wasn't a big deal, just a small inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The size and comfort are both great on this sofa
customer_reviews.text: The size and comfort are both great on this sofa, great value, but it's only 4 out of 5 because of the legs. Another comment mentioned this as well. You literally have to use a drill to get the holes started, and even then, the fabric undercover gets tangled within the drill when drilling the holes. The plastic feet feel cheap as well but are functional. With pre-drilled holes or an easier method to connect the feet this would be a 5 but it took me an hour to get those legs on and it was a total nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and very comfortable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this couch off amazon and am very satisfied with the product. At first I was skeptical about buying a couch online. But I have been using Amazon for awhile and figured the quality should be fine. Overall it is a very comfortable for the price. Very good size and the material is much more comfortable than you would think.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Nudo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy bought the matching ottoman and I love the combo
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than expected! Very comfy bought the matching ottoman and I love the combo
customer_reviews.author: Jessamyn

customer_reviews.title: easy to piece together and pretty much exactly how we ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, easy to piece together and pretty much exactly how we expected it to be. A solid sectional for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars great couch!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in 4 short days easy to move and assemble and super comfortable!!!! Update review! Been a year since I purchased and still in love with this couch easy to keep clean! Stands the test of messy kids and dogs that love to jump and spill all over the couch still as solid and comfortable as the day we purchased! Can’t beat the price worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole mcnulty

customer_reviews.title: awesome couch no junk here
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better couches I have ever own so comfy fall asleep on it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sofa is exactly what we expected. Great for the money. Very comfy and we were very pleased with delivery service too.
customer_reviews.author: Sanna Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great couch!
customer_reviews.text: Easy delivery. There are no holes to screw in the feet but otherwise fantastic look and feel. Very comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Cody Oliver

customer_reviews.title: I love my new couch
customer_reviews.text: I love my new couch. It's comfortable and looks great. My only negative thought is that the legs were a little difficult to screw in and position. There weren't drill holes or indicators where to screw the nails in.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Very good piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Very good piece of furniture. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Super nice and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last month from another retailer but the same exact sofa. It comes in 2 pieces which easily go together and stay together. The material appears to be super durable. It is like a cross between the texture of jeans and microfiber. the cushions all unzip so they are easily cleaned. The sofa not only looks really nice but is actually very comfortable. Its very heavy even without the packaging, but I feel like thats because its well made. The color is beautiful redish color not anywhere near orange . As pictured maybe a little bit darker it may just be the lighting. Overall purchasing this online I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Parlin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Couch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this couch from a local retailer- and I love it! Its very comfy for myself and my other half. I was hesitant to order online from them- but was not disappointed. My guy is 6'3 and has a feeling that his legs are too long for lots of furniture, but that is not the case with this one. He can not only sit comfortably- but lay down without his feet hanging over the edges like with most furniture. Excellent purchase, would definitely suggest this purchase if you're interested in a new sectional.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: It definitely isn't the nicest feeling couch. And we've had it for 2 months and it's breaking down really fast. The frame is already broken on the ottoman. I would definitely reconsider purchasing this couch.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Sinking couch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this exact couch through another internet retailer after seeing it in an Ashley’s showroom. This couch lasted MAYBE 6 months before being completely unusable. I had to put plywood under the cushions to prevent sinking in to the couch completely. 3 years I’ve had this thing and finally bit the bullet and bought a replacement. Good riddance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture Benchcraft Maier Sectional with Right Side Facing Chaise in Charcoal Microfiber
product_meta.description: Color:Charcoal| Style:Right Arm Facing SectionalThe comfortable contemporary design of the ''Maier-Charcoal'' upholstery collection features plush boxed seating and back cushions giving you the comfort you desire while helping enhance your Home's decor with exciting jumbo stitch detailing and tufted accents that embrace the modern style. [Fbc-2349Rfsec-Crc-Gg].

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars57 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
